name: Cadavre Exquis
description:
Cadavre Exquis is a surrealist group drawing exercise, where each person draws a section of a composition without being able to see the other sections. In a workshop at Kër Thiossane / Defko Akniep in Dakar, participants each wrote javascript code to draw a section of a larger composition. This project is a framework for displaying those drawings together, and shows the results of the workshop.

Tap to cycle through compositions. Refresh to fully randomize.

Source code available on github.
